jobsJson.descriptionPlain: BI Driver team supports Gojek Driver Operations and Driver Platform team in maximizing the impact of data-driven business decision making through establishing and maintaining Single Source of Truth (SSoT) Data Warehouse, developing data pipeline, creating dashboards for business reporting and analytics, and partnering with Ops business and product development teams in conducting data analysis to solve business problems. This role will be working closely with business teams across different Driver Operations and Driver Platform pods: Driver Income, Driver Experience, Driver Acquisition, Driver Communication.
jobsJson.description: BI Driver team supports Gojek Driver Operations and Driver Platform team in maximizing the impact of data-driven business decision making through establishing and maintaining Single Source of Truth (SSoT) Data Warehouse, developing data pipeline, creating dashboards for business reporting and analytics, and partnering with Ops business and product development teams in conducting data analysis to solve business problems. This role will be working closely with business teams across different Driver Operations and Driver Platform pods: Driver Income, Driver Experience, Driver Acquisition, Driver Communication.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Gain a holistic understanding of how Gojek Driver Ops works
  • Be the data partner across different Driver Ops pods to solve business problems
  • Build a good working relationship with different stakeholders within Gojek BI and Driver Ops organization
  • Conduct product experimentation and post-deployment analysis for Driver App features
  • Build report and dashboard to monitor Driver Ops OKR and important metrics
  • Evaluate data flow process & data output and give improvement suggestions
  • Deliver work not limited to business analysis using statistical tools, data visualization tools (Tableau, Metabase, etc), as well as data crunching with SQL
  • Be a humble and helpful team player

• 1-3 years of experience working with SQL and great at both data visualization and dashboarding tool (Tableau/Metabase/etc)
  • Have strong business sense with data-driven mindset, goal-oriented with creative thinking, excellent in communication and good at collaborative working
  • Fair understanding of Shell script Familiar with ETL / Airflow and interested or experienced in Machine Learning using R/Python
